description: This source file provides JSON serialization and deserialization handlers for various OVS_MAP and OVS_SMAP data structures, including maps of integers, booleans, reals, strings, UUIDs, and nested maps. It defines generalized functions for converting between JSON and internal representations, with specific handlers for different data types used in an Open vSwitch context.
